modName: Thaik - Redguard Sailor - A New Start
summary: You\'re a sailor from Stros M\'kai. You wake up in a wreck of a ship, near Winterhold. All of your friends were drowned or dead. Everything is burning. You must escape!
descriptionHtml:
You\'re a sailor from Stros M\'kai. You wake up in a wreck of a ship, near Winterhold. All of your friends were drowned or dead. Everything is frozen. You don\'t have anything but ragged clothes, a steel dagger and an iron sword. Suddenly, you hear a terrifying sound - sound of a dragon! It\'s circling around the wreck of the ship. You are taking your equipments from chest nearby and starting to walk outside and you see a dragon. Will you run, or kill it? It\'s your choice.

*You are Dragonborn but you don\'t know anything about Helgen incident.
*If you kill the dragon, you will absorb its soul and seek for explanation of this.
*You\'re a middle-aged Redguard, and your one eye is blind.
*Outside of the ship, a frost-dragon awaits you.
*Closest town is Winterhold.
*I recommend to play in Expert difficulty.
author: Despierto
